ul_426883: ip addr | awk ' !/127.0.0.1/ && /inet/ { gsub(/\/.*/, "", $2); print "IP="$2 } '

$ ip -o -4  address show  | awk ' NR==2 { gsub(/\/.*/, "", $4); print $4 } '
192.168.1.249

#!/bin/bash
echo -n "IP="
ip -o -4  address show  | awk ' NR==2 { gsub(/\/.*/, "", $4); print $4 } '

$ ip -o -4  address show  | awk ' NR==2 { gsub(/\/.*/, "", $4); print "IP="$4 } ' 
IP=192.168.1.249

au_635525: sudo tcpdump -l -q ip | awk '{system("echo " $0 " > out")}'

sudo tcpdump -l -q ip | awk '{print $3}'

sudo tcpdump -l -q ip | awk '/tcp/ {print $0}'

sudo tcpdump -l -q ip | awk '/tcp/ {"echo " $0 " > out"}'
